v8:item.v8:content: Page header on restoring the following settings will be installed in the cluster
Page header on restoring the following settings will be installed in the cluster
Information on switching the following settings will be installed in the cluster
If you enable the use of security profiles in servers cluster of 1C:Enterprise for current infobase the following permissions will be provided:
Page header it is required to make changes in cluster
Page header it is required to make changes in cluster
Warning it is required to make changes in cluster

In cluster 1C:Enterprise security profiles were set for this infobase which restrict access to external resources.
To continue current action you should change the content of permissions in security profile:
Page header on restoring the following settings will be set in cluster
Page header on restoring the following settings will be set in cluster
Information on switching the following settings will be installed in the cluster
When you restore security profiles in servers cluster of 1C:Enterprise for current infobase the following permissions will be provided:
Header it is required to cancel out of date cluster permissions
Header it is required to cancel out of date cluster permissions
Warning it is required to make changes in cluster

In cluster 1C:Enterprise security profiles were set for this infobase which restrict access to external resources. You should update the permissions settings in security profiles in servers cluster because when you used the application some settings were changed (which affect the use of external resources):
Not managed to set permissions in the security profile:
Error group of COM connector version
Error group of COM connector version
If an error occurs in comcntr features version you should register it (restart session is required).
To set permissions in security profile you should specify connection parameters to the server cluster in which infobase is deployed:
Pages connection parameters to cluster via
Page connection to COM cluster parameters
Page connection to COM cluster parameters
Group connection to COM cluster parameters
Name or IP address of the server
Page connection to RAS cluster parameters
Group connection to RAS cluster parameters
Name or IP address of the server
Administrator of infobase on whose behalf setting is made
The password of the infobase administrator on behalf of whom the sessions are terminated forcibly
Decoration need to restart warning picture
After you change settings of security profiles in servers cluster the application will restart automatically.
Page operation is not supported in wen client
Page operation is not supported in wen client
Group operation is not supported in the web client
Group operation is not supported in the web client
Decoration operation is not supported in wen client
Group operation is not supported in web client details
Group operation is not supported in web client details

In cluster 1C:Enterprise security profiles were set for this infobase which restrict access to external resources.
To continue the current you should change the following security profiles settings in servers cluster:

You can nor make changes in security profiles settings in servers cluster if you use web client to connect to the application.
To perform the operation you connect to the application using a thin client and retry the operation.
Commands operation is not supported in the web client
Commands operation is not supported in the web client
Allow or deny access to external resourses
Register component and restart the application
